name: Sales Page Template
description: High-converting sales page for low-ticket digital products
use_when: Creating a sales page for an online course

hero.format: Strong headline and sub-headline that clearly communicate value proposition
guidelines: Consider adding VSL or product mockup
Keep headline under 15 words for impact

quiz.purpose: Breakdown of 2-3 key archetypes who would benefit from this product
guidelines: Use relatable pain points for each

instructor.purpose: Establish authority and trust with creator credentials
guidelines: Focus on expertise related to product topic
Add personal touch to build connection

proof.format: Bulleted list of tangible results and milestones
guidelines: Focus on results relevant to product topic

problems.format: List of 7-10 major pain points the product solves
guidelines: Make each problem specific and relatable
Order from most to least impactful

mistakes.format: Deep dive into 3 biggest mistakes with solutions
guidelines: Explain why each mistake is harmful
Show how the product helps avoid each mistake

everything_included.format: Detailed breakdown of product content and components
guidelines: Consider adding value estimates for each component
Explain specific value of each bonus
Connect bonuses to main product benefits
Add deadline or scarcity if applicable

faq.format: Answers to common objections and questions

guarantee.purpose: Remind of risk-free nature of offer
guidelines: Clearly state guarantee terms (14-day, no questions asked)

quality_criteria.description: Clearly communicates main benefit or outcome
Uses concrete details rather than vague claims

formatting_guidelines: Break up text with bullet points
Use occasional bold text for emphasis
Add relevant images or icons for each section
forbidden_patterns: Don't use vague descriptions of benefits
Don't make guarantees you can't fulfill

tone: Practical, not aspirational; show don't tell
structure: Hero section must have headline under 15 words for maximum impact
Quiz section should help visitors immediately self-identify
Problems section should use actual voice-of-customer language
Mistakes section must explain why each mistake is harmful before offering solution
Everything Included section should assign value estimates to each component
FAQ section must address price objections directly
Guarantee section should clearly state 14-day, no-questions-asked terms
required_elements: Strong headline that communicates main benefit in under 15 words
2-3 specific audience archetypes in Quiz section
Tangible proof with specific numbers and achievements
7-10 specific customer pain points in voice-of-customer language
3 biggest mistakes with detailed explanations and solutions
Detailed breakdown of all product components with value estimates
Clear bonus value amounts connected to main benefits
Direct addressing of common objections in FAQ section
Relevant images or icons for each section
